infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Smart Ring needs Bluetooth to connect to your ring and sync health data
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Smart Ring needs Bluetooth to connect to your ring and sync health data
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Smart Ring needs access to read your health data from Apple Health to provide comprehensive health insights
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Smart Ring needs access to write health data to Apple Health to keep your records synchronized
